page.title: 10LAW AND ORDER WESTCOTT
page.content: Westcott local policeman P.C. Stuart and P.C. Begbie were interviewed and gave us the following information about crime and law enforcement in Westcott. The total population of the district is 2050 and last year the following incidents were reported: {4 non-injury road accidents, 6 injury {road accidents, 18 crimes (mostly {vandalism and petty theft), 2 fights, {1 field fire, 1 chimney fire, 2 people {reported missing, 1 sudden death. P.C. Stuart informed us that most crimes were committed by those in the 14-16 year age group. On crime prevention he said,{"Just being there {prevents crime but we can't be {everywhere at once." { }An attitude survey where 43 villagers were interviewed shows that the public believe theft, litter, vandalism and speeding are problems.
